# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    wrapped_text = ""
    current_line_length = 0

    for word in words
        if current_line_length + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            wrapped_text *= "\n"
            current_line_length = 0
        end

        if current_line_length > 0
            wrapped_text *= " "
        end

        wrapped_text *= word
        current_line_length += length(word) + 1
    end

    return wrapped_text
end

# Example
text = "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text)
println(wrapped_text)
```
